news.title: Zillow shares are getting crushed. Here's why
news.description: Zillow shares fell more than 11% on Monday as investors grew concerned that Google could be testing real estate listings on its search page.

news.title: Trump admin to hire 1,000 specialists for 'Tech Force' to build AI, finance projects
news.description: A slew of tech giants, including Amazon Web Services, Apple, Google Public Sector, Dell Technologies, Microsoft, Nvidia and OpenAI, are listed as partners.

news.title: Hassett's Fed chair candidacy received pushback from high-level people close to Trump, sources say
news.description: There's concern that the National Economic Council director is too close to the president.
